CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.1.9.2.b, patientdeathreport (250AN)
E2B (R3): D.9.2.r.2 Reported Cause(s) of Death (free text) Conformance: Optional, but required if D.9.2.r.1 is populated. Data Type: 250AN OID: None Value Allowed: Free text
CustomField.inlineHelpText: MedDRA term should be used if applicable.
CustomField.label: Reported Cause of Death
